content: hey <@602753420033785856> - I've updated the era file spec to include the latest points we talked about in AMS - lmk if anything is unclear: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/unstable/docs/e2store.md#era-files= - long story short, the state with block applied is now stored in the era file which allows us to verify a chain of era files more easily (with only `hash_tree_root` and sig verification - no state transition needed)
